welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dordrecht, a charming city known for its picturesque canals and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy the city's beautiful architecture, vibrant culture, and friendly locals during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Woensdrecht Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Woensdrecht Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
